name: Spirit Signal
description:
You are a construction worker tasked to find lost items in an abandoned scientific factory, that was left behind after an accident involving radio-activity and DEATH.

Use your flashlight to find your way through the building and listen to the signals on your geiger counter to avoid and dangerous radiation. Or worse...

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

LMB - activate clicked item, do this on anything that looks out of place

RMB - activate held item
